_header: Now cooled is Dame Venus brand
_description: William Dunbar, ‘Of luve erdly and divine’ — fifteen quatrains, plus 2-line burden (bb), ‘Now cumis aige quhair ȝewth hes bene / And trew luve rysis fro the Splene’

Banna.First Lines:
Now culit is dame venus brandTrew luvis fyre is ay
                    kindilland…
Banna.Last Lines:
…Now cumis Aige quhair ȝewth hes beneAnd trew luve rysis
                    fro the splene
